# drawable component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute  | Description                       | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `height`    | `height`   | To set height to drawable element | `number` | `undefined` |
| `width`     | `width`    | To set width to drawable element  | `number` | `undefined` |
| `pen-width` | `penWidth` | To set pen width to drawable pen  | `number` | `undefined` |
| `color`     | `color`    | To change color of pen            | `string` | `black`     |
